description: MuddyWater has used legitimate tools [ConnectWise](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0591), [RemoteUtilities](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0592), and SimpleHelp to gain access to the target environment.(Citation: Anomali Static Kitten February 2021)(Citation: group-ib_muddywater_infra)
